page.title: 02CLENT HILLS
page.content:
The Clent Hills are used for a {country park.}The land around it is used for farming and grazing. There is a field where people practise horse jumping. There are a lot of country walks about. There is a wood in the surroundings of {Hagley Hall.}We saw a game warden. He is someone who looks after the grounds. There are a lot of clay pigeons about. (These are things that people shoot instead of real pigeons.) We saw a couple of deers in the wood.
The entrances to the wood were padlocked and have barbed wire on them. You have to get permission to enter.
